item.title: What is Soliloquy?
item.description: Soliloquy refers to the act of speaking one’s thoughts aloud, whether alone or in the presence of others. It’s a technique often used by characters in plays to convey their innermost emotions and ideas. Now, I’m excited to share that I’ve developed a new mobile application that can help you learn foreign languages by speaking! If you’re interested in trying the beta version of the app, please sign up for our waiting list by clicking here: join waiting list!
